description: Compute functions of 3D warp displacements, such as bulk volume change, shear energy, and vorticity energy.

input_warp.title: Input Warp
input_warp.description: 'www' is the name of the 3D warp dataset (mandatory option).

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: 'ppp' is the name of the new output dataset.

bulk_flag.title: Bulk Volume Change Flag
bulk_flag.description: Compute the (fractional) bulk volume change (Jacobian determinant minus 1).

all_flag.title: Compute All Functions
all_flag.description: Compute all 3 functions: bulk, shear, and vorticity.
